samsunginternet_android.notes: This property is only supported on Windows and Linux. Samsung Internet is not on Windows or Linux.

webview_android.notes: From version 3 to 4.3, there is a serious bug where text-rendering: optimizeLegibility causes custom web fonts to not render. This was fixed in version 4.4.

firefox.notes: If the font size is 20 pixels or higher, Firefox treats auto as optimizeLegibility. For smaller text, Firefox treats auto as optimizeSpeed. The 20-pixel threshold can be changed with the browser.display.auto_quality_min_font_size preference.

firefox_android.notes: If the font size is 20 pixels or higher, Firefox treats auto as optimizeLegibility. For smaller text, Firefox treats auto as optimizeSpeed. The 20-pixel threshold can be changed with the browser.display.auto_quality_min_font_size preference.

safari.notes: Safari treats auto as optimizeSpeed. See WebKit bug 41363.

safari_ios.notes: Safari treats auto as optimizeSpeed. See WebKit bug 41363.
